activity_feed.loading_error: There was a problem loading data for your activity feed.

donation.save_xhr_error_msg: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to save the change. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.
donation.thank_you_submit_xhr_error_msg: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to send your thank you. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.
donation.thank_you_fetch_xhr_error_msg: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to load your past messages. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.
donation.donor_profile_icon_alt_text_link: Profile image for donor that is a link to their profile (new window)
donation.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this donation? This action cannot be undone.

campaign_setup.add_description_content: Write something that explains exactly why you're so passionate about your cause and where the money is going.
campaign_setup.edit_description_success: Your description was added successfully. And only two spelling mistakes. Just joking. We didn't read what you wrote.
campaign_setup.edit_description_error: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to save your description. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.
campaign_setup.add_photo_content: Your donors will see your cover photo before they see anything else. A decent pic is pretty important.
campaign_setup.choose_charity_content: You need to select a charity before you can start raising money. We'll take care of getting the money you raise directly to the charity.
campaign_setup.chosen_charity_content: You are raising money for %{beneficiary}. We'll take care of getting the money you raise directly to the charity.
campaign_setup.description_placeholder: Tell everyone about your fundraiser and why your cause is so important. Make it personal and compelling.
campaign_setup.set_goal_content: Setting a goal isn't required but it'll help you raise more money for your cause. Everyone will want you to hit your goal.
campaign_setup.set_goal_modal_description: Setting up a campaign goal lets people see how much you need. It's ok if you don't reach it, you still get the funds.
campaign_setup.edit_goal_success: Your goal was added successfully. Be relentless about asking your supporters to help you hit your goal. They'll want to help.
campaign_setup.edit_goal_error: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to save your goal. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.
campaign_setup.share_campaign_content: Sharing is the key to a successful fundraising. Email everyone, post on social, make a video. Be relentless.
campaign_setup.share_email_error: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to send your email. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.

dashboard_campaign_update.post_content_error_required: It seems you may have forgotten to add a message. It's ok, we'll wait.
dashboard_campaign_update.url_prompt_text: Please enter a URL to insert
dashboard_campaign_update.first_donation_item_message: It's important you thank your donors super quick. We make it easy... just tap on Say Thanks on your donations.
dashboard_campaign_update.update_notice: Good news. We'll automatically send this update to your donors and post it on your fundraiser page.
dashboard_campaign_update.update_warning: This Update has not yet been posted.
dashboard_campaign_update.image_modal_emphasis: Choose or drag an image from your computer
dashboard_campaign_update.image_modal_restrictions: JPG, GIF, or PNG file • 8 MB
dashboard_campaign_update.delete_update_confirm_msg: Once you delete this update, it will be gone. No take backs.
dashboard_campaign_update.publish_success: Your update posted successfully. Send lots of updates so your supporters stay engaged. If you’re reading this for the 4th time, that’s a very good sign.
dashboard_campaign_update.publish_xhr_error: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to publish your update. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.

page_not_found.not_found_msg: Great News. You found a secret page. It's not really a secret page but we thought that sounded better than saying you clicked on a link that no longer exists.
page_not_found.visit_homepage: Click here to go to the CrowdRise.com Homepage
page_not_found.visit_dashboard: Click here to go back to Dashboard
page_not_found.contact_us: Click here if you need help or just want to talk about this secret page.

global.facebook_link_success: You have successfully linked your facebook account.
global.facebook_link_error: There was an error linking your facebook account.

project.campaign_created: You created your CrowdRise campaign. So awesome.
project.get_word_out_text: Tell everyone you know about your amazing fundraiser. It's so, so easy just use the Share button.
project.loading_error: Your dashboard didn't load. Try hitting refresh and if it still doesn't load, email us and we'll solve everything and send you a special prize to at least try to make up for it.
project.delete_fundraiser_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this fundraiser?

metapanel.graph_placeholder_text: There's a secret behind this message. For real. You get to see it after your first donation.

milestone.badge_25_alt_text: Fantastic start. This is a badge for reaching 25% of your goal.
milestone.badge_50_alt_text: Halfway there. This is a badge for reaching 50% of your goal.
milestone.badge_90_alt_text: So, so close. This is a badge for reaching 90% of your goal.
milestone.badge_100_alt_text: Incredible News! This is a badge for reaching 100% of your goal.
milestone.badge_50_circle_bottom: We spelled there wrong on purpose
milestone.badge_90_circle_bottom: Please stop looking at this circle
milestone.first_donation_msg: It's important you thank your donors super quick. We make it easy... just tap on 'Say Thanks' on your donations.
milestone.percentage_msg: Congrats, you've raised %{percentOfGoalReached}% of your goal. That's a big deal and a great reason to reach out to your donors with an Update.
milestone.message_25: Your CrowdRise campaign is off to a fantastic start. Perfect time to post an update
milestone.message_50: Your halfway to goal. Post an update to share the good news. You're not your.
milestone.message_90: You're so close to hitting your goal. Post an update and hit your goal today.
milestone.message_100: GOAL!!! We never use exclamation points at CrowdRise, but you just hit your goal.

notificationPanel.wepay_message: Hi, we really need you to set this up, this will ensure that you get your donation money. Unless you want us to put it in a plastic bag and sent it with messenger pigeon. That's fine too.
notificationPanel.welcome_message: This is your new campaign dashboard, here is where you manage donations, updates, donor messages and more! Let's get familiar.

thank_you_form.feed_item_textarea_placeholder: Write your thank you note here and we'll send the email.

sidebar.upload_cover_text: A cover on your campaign makes all the difference

social.email_input_label: Email your campaign info to friends and family:
social.email_share_text: Please check out my fundraising campaign on CrowdRise
social.email_recaptcha_error: Please click the reCAPTCHA checkbox below. They are very strict around here.
social.email_default_body: It'll mean so much to me if you support my CrowdRise campaign. I'm sending this to my closest friends and family to check out first:%0D%0A%0D%0A %{url} %0D%0A%0D%0AThanks so much,%0D%0A%0D%0A %{owner}
social.email_campaign_update_body: Check out the latest update from %{teamName}:%0D%0A%0D%0A %{url}
social.fb_share_update_description: Click here to view the latest update on %{teamName} by %{projectOwner}

offline_donation_manager.description: If your friends donate by check or hand you a pile of cash or a stack of casino chips, you can enter their name and donation amount below and the donor will show up in your donations scroll and everyone will be happy.  If you want to enter checks in bulk, just make the Display Name say something like "Offline Donations."
offline_donation_manager.toast_fail: Ooops.. something went wrong and we weren't able to save your offline donations. Please try again or contact us (quintas@crowdrise.com) for help.
